name: TiMac
description:
This game is perfect for those hockey type people, the left side is in your complete control, while the right side is completely automated. GOOD LUCK!!

Also why not get competitive about it, why not get several people to take turns playing this game, see you scores the most points, or just see who overall loses or wins by defeating the bot.

!!!IMPORTANT!!!

Go To TiMac in your "Library" and click "Show local files"

Then click 616729.html to launch the game. I am currently working on an application to install the game directly to your pc and open an application to play the game.

Enjoy The Game And Have Fun!!!
